heading: HOTFIX 3 – JULY 21, 2023 – 1.1.0
content: They are implementing a reduction to overall monster power levels in Nightmare dungeons. The new top range for tier 100 will feel like what tier 70 was previously. If you haven't already, head over to our and select the D4 role in to stay up to date with our content development. Sanctuary here we come! Written by:
